name: Fruit Derivatives Puree Aseptic
description: Fruit Derivatives Puree Aseptic is a product made from fruit (90%â€“100%), with water being an optional addition (up to 10%) and the option of using citric acid for pH adjustment. It is guaranteed to be free from rot, blemishes, and foreign matter. The product's color, odor, and taste all reflect the typical and characteristic qualities of the named fruit. In terms of appearance, the puree has a viscous yet manageable texture, free from clumping. This versatile product is suitable for use in foodstuffs and is particularly valuable in the food industry for secondary processing.
